product_name: Isis Velocity Rain Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Isis Velocity rain jacket is made with fully waterproof Cocona(TM) fabric that will handle sudden downpours during a run while still being soft and comfortable for evenings out in town. Cocona(R) fabrics are made with fibers from activated carbon from coconut shells salvaged from food and water filter industry waste. Fabric wicks moisture, dries fast and breathes well for a high level of comfort while you're on the go. Raglan sleeves enhance fit, allowing freedom of movement. Cinch the hem to seal out cold air. Reflective hits increase visibility in low light. Front zippered pockets; 1 zippered back pocket; stand-up collar. Closeout.
short_description: The Isis Velocity rain jacket is made with fully waterproof Cocona(TM) fabric that will handle sudden downpours during a run while still being soft and comfortable for evenings out in town.
